title: Items
description: Modified `elements`. `Items` MUST be a single `element` with class(es) added. If an `item` uses a `generic` the first class MUST use the same name to extends it. First class SHOULD NOT add any additional rules.

sections.title: Buttons
description: Btns module classes SHOULD extend the `%btn` generic.

sections.title: Callouts
description: Callouts module classes SHOULD extend the `%callout` generic.

sections.title: General
description: General module MUST modify more than one type of element (eg. `.intro` can modify a `p` or `h1`).

sections.title: Headings
description: Headings module MUST only modify standalone `h1` - `h6`. MUST use modifier format (`-modifier`). Headings that are parts of `collections` MUST use child selector format (`parent__child`).

sections.title: Icons
description: Icons module. Most icons use the `sprite($file_name)` mixin provided by `/src/scss/00_bits/_sprites.scss`. Variable names are determined by svg file names in `src/icons/`. SVG file names MUST be named in snake case (eg. `snake_case`).
Icons not using the `sprite($file_name)` mixin SHOULD be CSS based (eg. CSS triangles below).
